name: v16.0.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Bump logback-classic from 1.2.6 to 1.2.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/1974
* Bump spring-test from 5.3.12 to 5.3.13 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/1975
* Release 14 by @yue9944882 in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/1976
* Adding release note for release-14 by @yue9944882 in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/1977
* Fix formatting by @dennis-benzinger-hybris in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/1979
* Bump bucket4j-core from 6.3.0 to 6.4.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/1984
* Update kubectl-equivalence-in-java.md by @shriyasankhyan in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/1973
* Update proto files to the latest definitions. Add some new versions. by @brendandburns in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/1969
* Regenerate fluent apis by @yue9944882 in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/1991
* #1802 Check if server is available from kubeconfig. by @cbuschka in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/1983
* Bump spring.boot.version from 2.5.6 to 2.5.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/1996
* Reduce the java matrix to just LTS versions. by @brendandburns in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/1999
* Bump mockito-core from 4.0.0 to 4.1.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2002
* Bump spring.boot.version from 2.5.7 to 2.6.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2001
* Bump bucket4j-core from 6.4.0 to 6.4.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2003
* Bump gmavenplus-plugin from 1.13.0 to 1.13.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2004
* Bump actions/cache from 2.1.6 to 2.1.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2005
* chore: 'adopt' --> 'temurin' by @sullis in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/1980
* Add exception handler to SharedInformerFactory by @cbuschka in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/1992
* Add Windows to our build matrix. by @brendandburns in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2000
* De-flake a couple tests. by @brendandburns in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2012
* Bump junit-vintage-engine from 5.8.1 to 5.8.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2011
* Bump spring.boot.version from 2.6.0 to 2.6.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2014
* support certificate chain when reading client certificate(s) by @rrayst in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2009
* GCPAuthenticator support without gcloud by @jhbae200 in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2007
* Bump caffeine from 2.9.2 to 2.9.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2020
* Bump bouncycastle.version from 1.69 to 1.70 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2021
* Bump maven-bundle-plugin from 5.1.2 to 5.1.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2024
* Bump logback-classic from 1.2.7 to 1.2.8 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2027
* Regenerate for Kubernetes 1.23 by @brendandburns in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2022
* Bump bucket4j-core from 6.4.1 to 7.0.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2028
* Bump snakeyaml from 1.29 to 1.30 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2029
* Bump mockito-core from 4.1.0 to 4.2.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2032
* Bump builder-annotations from 0.60.0 to 0.70.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2030
* Bump spring-test from 5.3.13 to 5.3.14 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2033
* Bump prometheus.client.version from 0.12.0 to 0.13.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2025
* Bump prometheus.client.version from 0.13.0 to 0.14.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2036
* Bump builder-annotations from 0.70.0 to 0.80.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2037
* Bump logback-classic from 1.2.8 to 1.2.9 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2038
* Bump spring.boot.version from 2.6.1 to 2.6.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2039
* Cherry Pick #1963 To Master by @ryanjbaxter in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2043
* gh-action: Upload snapshot as post-commit job by @yue9944882 in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2040
* Bump swagger-annotations from 1.6.3 to 1.6.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2048
* Bump logback-classic from 1.2.9 to 1.2.10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2049
* Fix arrayIndexOutOfBounds exception for overloaded addModelMap method by @yaohui-wyh in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2046
* Bump system-lambda from 1.2.0 to 1.2.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2052
* Release: Fixes snapshot job env var name by @yue9944882 in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2050
* Chore: Prune example keeping 13,14,15 by @yue9944882 in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2051
* Fixes snapshot job pt3 by @yue9944882 in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2054
* Bump assertj-core from 3.21.0 to 3.22.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2058
* Adding an manual release job that applies to release branches publishing maven releases by @yue9944882 in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2057
* Bump protobuf-java from 3.19.1 to 3.19.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2061
* Bump maven-bundle-plugin from 5.1.3 to 5.1.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2068
* Release Action: Send PR instead of direct push by @yue9944882 in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2070
* Bump build-helper-maven-plugin from 3.2.0 to 3.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2072
* Bump maven-jar-plugin from 3.2.0 to 3.2.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2073
* Fixes java 16 compability by @yue9944882 in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2078
* Bump maven-compiler-plugin from 3.8.1 to 3.9.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2088
* Flakiness: Fixes attach test failure by applying a longer delay by @yue9944882 in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2098
* Chore: Clarify platform os on github action build by @yue9944882 in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2096
* Bump okhttp to 4.9.2 by @yue9944882 in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2099
* Bump spring-test from 5.3.14 to 5.3.15 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2094
* Bump slf4j.version from 1.7.32 to 1.7.33 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2093
* Bump maven-jar-plugin from 3.2.1 to 3.2.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2087
* Bump protobuf-java from 3.19.2 to 3.19.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2083
* Bump spotless-maven-plugin from 2.17.2 to 2.20.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2092
* Improve descriptions a little bit with examples. by @brendandburns in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2080
* Bump spring.boot.version from 2.6.2 to 2.6.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2100
* Bump google-auth-library-oauth2-http from 1.3.0 to 1.4.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2104
* Fix OWNERS file : reviewer to reviewers by @Garima-Negi in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2103
* Bump slf4j.version from 1.7.33 to 1.7.35 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2108
* Bump mockito-core from 4.2.0 to 4.3.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2109
* Deprecating no-arg informer-factory by @yue9944882 in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2115
* Bump protobuf-java from 3.19.3 to 3.19.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2117
* Bump bucket4j-core from 7.0.0 to 7.1.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2118
* Bump system-stubs-core from 2.0.0 to 2.0.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2119
* Add Deployment rollout restart example by @ddubson in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2116
* Bump spotless-maven-plugin from 2.20.0 to 2.20.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2121
* Deflake ExecTest by @brendandburns in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2120
* Bump prometheus.client.version from 0.14.1 to 0.15.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2123
* Bump swagger-annotations from 1.6.4 to 1.6.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2125
* Bump slf4j.version from 1.7.35 to 1.7.36 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2126
* Bump spotless-maven-plugin from 2.20.1 to 2.20.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2127
* Deflake the DefaultControllerTest. by @brendandburns in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2124
* Bump builder-annotations from 0.80.0 to 0.80.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2131
* Bump bucket4j-core from 7.1.0 to 7.2.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2132
* Bump nexus-staging-maven-plugin from 1.6.8 to 1.6.10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2133
* Bump maven-javadoc-plugin from 3.3.1 to 3.3.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2134
* Bump gson from 2.8.9 to 2.9.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2135
* Deflake another test by @brendandburns in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2129
* Bump nexus-staging-maven-plugin from 1.6.10 to 1.6.11 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2140
* Bump jose4j from 0.7.9 to 0.7.10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2139
* Bump spock.version from 2.0-groovy-3.0 to 2.1-groovy-3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2138
* Bump maven-compiler-plugin from 3.9.0 to 3.10.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2136
* Bump spring-test from 5.3.15 to 5.3.16 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2141
* Bump spotless-maven-plugin from 2.20.2 to 2.21.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2145
* Bump nexus-staging-maven-plugin from 1.6.11 to 1.6.12 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2147
* Add support for transforming objects in shared informers by @dddddai in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2148
* Bump spring.boot.version from 2.6.3 to 2.6.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2149
* Bump google-auth-library-oauth2-http from 1.4.0 to 1.5.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2150
* Bump actions/checkout from 2.4.0 to 3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2155
* Bump logback-classic from 1.2.10 to 1.2.11 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2160
* Bump bucket4j-core from 7.2.0 to 7.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2161
* Bump awaitility from 4.1.1 to 4.2.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2162
* Bump mockito-core from 4.3.1 to 4.4.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2163
* Add macos to the matrix build. by @brendandburns in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2017
* Bump maven-compiler-plugin from 3.10.0 to 3.10.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2165
* Bump google-auth-library-oauth2-http from 1.5.3 to 1.6.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2171
* Support certificate based authentication from exec command by @pgalache in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2170
* Fixes flakiness in leader-election tests by @yue9944882 in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2174
* Bump jose4j from 0.7.10 to 0.7.11 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2175

* Bump spring.boot.version from 2.6.4 to 2.6.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2181

* Bump spotless-maven-plugin from 2.21.0 to 2.22.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2188
* don't use internal gson package when JDK provides alternative by @rotty3000 in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2187

name: v15.0.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Automated Release: 15.0.0 by @github-actions in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2185
* Cherrypick  #2197 to release-15 by @yue9944882 in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2205
* Cherrypick release-15 #2206: Automated Generate from openapi release-1.23 by @yue9944882 in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/2212


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/compare/v15.0.0...v15.0.1

name: v15.0.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Bump logback-classic from 1.2.6 to 1.2.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/1974
* Bump spring-test from 5.3.12 to 5.3.13 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/1975
* Release 14 by @yue9944882 in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/1976
* Adding release note for release-14 by @yue9944882 in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/1977
* Fix formatting by @dennis-benzinger-hybris in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/1979
* Bump bucket4j-core from 6.3.0 to 6.4.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/1984
* Update kubectl-equivalence-in-java.md by @shriyasankhyan in https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/1973

name: Release 14.0.0
body: See [changelog](https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md)

name: Release 13.0.1
body: See [changelog](https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md)

name: Release 13.0.0
body:
Release Notes:
  * Add support for AdmissionReview objects
  * Fixes duplicated SharedProcessor#shouldResync calls (#1727)
  * Kubernetes 1.21.x API generation
  * Improved Java 16 Compatability
  * Fix SpringExampleController so it doesn't crash on startup (#1686)
  * Lots of dependency updates

name: Release 9.0.2
body:
Release Notes:
* Fixes path normalization for files in Copy (#1426)

name: Release 10.0.1
body:
Release Notes:
* Fixes path normalization for files in Copy (#1426)

name: Release 11.0.0
body:
Release Notes:
* Major release in support of Kubernetes 1.19.x
* Improvements to Spring support for Kubernetes
* Misc. bug fixes
* Lots of dependencies rev'd to latest by dependabot

name: Release 10.0.0
body:
* Latest release supporting Kubernetes 1.18.x
* `kubectl` equivalent commands
* Bug fixes

name: Release 9.0.2
body: Latest release, including Informer fixes.

name: Release 6.0.1
body:
Changes in this release:
* Fix: remove the capacity limit of ProcessorListener
* Fixes unexpectedly listener quitting leads to OOM  approved
* Fix: should not return from DefaultController.worker() method
* manually set OKHttpClient read timeout zero ensure client doesnot timeout
* Fixes leaking informer#controller daemon thread
* Release/flush websocket buffers on abnormal closing
* Add workqueue support
* Add leader election
* Feat: Structurelize patch object

name: Release 5.0.0
body:
Release 5.0.0

* Fix a problem that lister cannot get resource correctly
* Update openapi metadata from k/k 1.14 branch
* Feat: Provide thread-safety for pager
* Fixes patch format to support various patch formats
* Refactor pager to support colon-loop java grammar
* add workqueue implementation for kube-style controller
* Fixes watch conflict handling in informer and more test coverage
* Added support for KUBECONFIG environment variable with multiple paths.
* Fix some problems with watches that return a v1.Status
* Support client.authentication.k8s.io/v1beta1 ExecCredential

name: Relase 4.0.0
body:
Changes since 4.0.0-beta1
* Fix DateTime string generation. (#500)
* Update proto buff files for 1.13.0 (#498)
* Improve auth tests, fix a bug in credential parsing (#465)
* NPE System.getenv(ENV_HOME) returns null on Windows (#455)
* Fix serialization of null quantities  (#442)

*Note*
This library includes an update to the generated Kubernetes code which may contain breaking API changes.

name: Release 4.0.0-beta1
body:
* Fix Quantity serialization
* Add merge in ProtoClient
* Invoke async callback on unexpected exceptions
* Update to 1.12 generated code. Fix a few compile errors w/ the new code.

name: Release 3.0.0
body:
Changes since `2.0.0`

* Expand HOME detection on Windows. 
* Changed to set USERPROFILE on Windows environment.
* Add utilities for copying files.
* shutdown okhttp client after exec call 
* add constructDateTime to snakeYaml CustomConstructor
* Dropped reference to gson internal API
* Implemented equals method for Quantity
* set content-type to merge-patch+json while building nodePatchCall
* support client certificate chain 
* feat (#137): Introduce builder generation.
* Close watches more cleanly.
* Avoid use SystemClassLoader on Yaml.
* Add config file persistence. 
* Support refresh for Azure Active Directory tokens.
* Regenerate client for Kubernetes 1.11

name: Release 3.0.0-beta1
body:
* feat (#137): Introduce builder generation.
* Close watches more cleanly.
* Avoid use SystemClassLoader on Yaml.
* Add config file persistence.
* Support refresh for Azure Active Directory tokens. 
* Regenerate client for Kubernetes 1.11

name: Release 2.0.0
body: No changes from 2.0.0-beta2

name: 2.0.0-beta2
body:
Changes since 1.0.0:
* Update Guava dependency.  #301 by brendandburns
* Added OSGi support and updated plugins #291 #292 
* Client overwriting my app's logback configuration #276 #284
* Support equals() for IntOrString #283
* Close the response body in the case of error. #281
* Add a warning and an exception if a watch is created with debugging enabled. #280
* Update to 1.10 API.

name: Release 1.0.0
body:
First official stable release!

Fixes:
  * Fix a bug with HTML escaping byte arrays (#240)
  * Fix a bug with YAML parsing IntOrString types (#242)

name: Release 1.0.0-beta4
body:
Fixes

* Add default true to stdout and stderr on Exec. (#227), fixes #225
* Add single argument constructor in Quantity (#223), fixes #229

name: 1.0.0-beta3
body:
## Fixes

* Fix a bug where bearer-token auth didn't work pod to pod
  (https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/issues/180)
* Improve SSH key handling
  (https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/198, https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/200)

## Enhancements

* Add a custom ConfigBuilder
  (https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/171)
* Add support for easy YAML loading
  (https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/207)
* Add support for Azure AAD Authentication
  (https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/201)

name: 1.0.0-beta2
body:
## Fixes

* Fix a bug when Watch returns a Status object
  ([#165](https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/165)).
* Add support for Quantity type
  ([#129](https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/129)).
* Add support for IntOrString
  ([#108](https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/108)).
* Fix some leaks by calling close
  ([#106](https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/165)).

name: 1.0.0-beta1
body:
This is the first beta release of this client.

## Features

* Support for Kubernetes 1.8 ([#84](https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/84)).

## Fixes

* Allow kubeconfig to be loaded without current-context ([#81](https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/81)).

## Fixes

* Correctly configure in-cluster token-based authentication ([#75](https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/75)).

## Features

* Allow client to be instantiated with a custom `context` ([#65](https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/65)), 

* Protocol buffer client  ([#67](https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/67)), ([#69](https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/69)), ([#71](https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/71)).

## Miscellanious 

* Rename `client-java-util` package to `client-java` ([#73)](https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/pull/73)).
Initial release of client.
